Expansion performed internally based on codesystem Medication Line Adherence Status v1.1.0 (CodeSystem)

This value set contains 11 concepts

LevelCodeSystemDisplayDefinition
1  takinghttps://www.ehealth.fgov.be/standards/fhir/terminology/CodeSystem/BeMedicationLineAdherenceStatusTakingThe medication is being taken.
2    taking-as-directedhttps://www.ehealth.fgov.be/standards/fhir/terminology/CodeSystem/BeMedicationLineAdherenceStatusTaking As DirectedThe medication is being taken as directed.
2    taking-not-as-directedhttps://www.ehealth.fgov.be/standards/fhir/terminology/CodeSystem/BeMedicationLineAdherenceStatusTaking Not As DirectedThe medication is not being taken as directed.
1  not-takinghttps://www.ehealth.fgov.be/standards/fhir/terminology/CodeSystem/BeMedicationLineAdherenceStatusNot TakingThe medication is not being taken.
2    on-holdhttps://www.ehealth.fgov.be/standards/fhir/terminology/CodeSystem/BeMedicationLineAdherenceStatusOn HoldThe medication is on hold.
3      on-hold-as-directedhttps://www.ehealth.fgov.be/standards/fhir/terminology/CodeSystem/BeMedicationLineAdherenceStatusOn Hold As DirectedThe medication is on hold as directed.
3      on-hold-not-as-directedhttps://www.ehealth.fgov.be/standards/fhir/terminology/CodeSystem/BeMedicationLineAdherenceStatusOn Hold Not As DirectedThe medication is on hold not as directed.
2    stoppedhttps://www.ehealth.fgov.be/standards/fhir/terminology/CodeSystem/BeMedicationLineAdherenceStatusStoppedThe medication is stopped.
3      stopped-as-directedhttps://www.ehealth.fgov.be/standards/fhir/terminology/CodeSystem/BeMedicationLineAdherenceStatusStopped As DirectedThe medication is stopped as directed.
3      stopped-not-as-directedhttps://www.ehealth.fgov.be/standards/fhir/terminology/CodeSystem/BeMedicationLineAdherenceStatusStopped Not As DirectedThe medication is stopped not as directed.
1  unknownhttps://www.ehealth.fgov.be/standards/fhir/terminology/CodeSystem/BeMedicationLineAdherenceStatusUnknownWhether the medication is being taken or not is not currently known.

text.div:
Expansion performed internally based on codesystem Medicationrequest status v4.0.1 (CodeSystem)

This value set contains 5 concepts

CodeSystemDisplayDefinition
  activehttp://hl7.org/fhir/CodeSystem/medicationrequest-statusActiveThe prescription is 'actionable', but not all actions that are implied by it have occurred yet.
  completedhttp://hl7.org/fhir/CodeSystem/medicationrequest-statusCompletedAll actions that are implied by the prescription have occurred.
  cancelledhttp://hl7.org/fhir/CodeSystem/medicationrequest-statusCancelledThe prescription has been withdrawn before any administrations have occurred
  stoppedhttp://hl7.org/fhir/CodeSystem/medicationrequest-statusStoppedActions implied by the prescription are to be permanently halted, before all of the administrations occurred. This should not be used if the original order was entered in error
  entered-in-errorhttp://hl7.org/fhir/CodeSystem/medicationrequest-statusEntered in ErrorSome of the actions that are implied by the medication request may have occurred. For example, the medication may have been dispensed and the patient may have taken some of the medication. Clinical decision support systems should take this status into account
